DOC.brief_summary: This study assesses the impact of a mindfulness-based stress reduction program compared with a health education program for urban middle-school male youth on outcomes of psychological symptoms, coping, stress, sleep, and behavior.
DOC.criteria: 7th or 8th graders at St. Ignatius Loyola Academy in 20092010 academic year. Parent/guardian consents Student assents Exclusion Criteria (as assessed by school staff): significant psychopathology significant developmental delay significant substance abuse with behavioral consequences significant behavioral problems foster care due to consent restrictions)
